alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 12:30AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northern Piscataquis... northwestern Aroostook and Somerset Counties... At 1228 AM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Estcourt Station to near Nine-mile Bridge to 23 miles southwest of Billy-Jack Depot...and moving east AT 35 MPH. Locations impacted include... Fort Kent, Madawaska, Eagle Lake, Allagash, Clayton Lake, Saint Pamphile, Deboullie Mountain, Frenchville, Portage Lake, New Canada, Caucomgomoc Lake, Russel Crossing, Allagash Township, Cross Lake, Tamway, Churchill Dam, Big Machias Lake, Nine-mile Bridge, Baker Lake and Fish River Lake. This includes the following highways... US Highway 1 between Madawaska and Frenchville. State Highway 11 between Winterville and Wallagrass. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Travel is not advised during these heavy snow showers. Rapid visibility reduction could lead to accidents.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
